
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


add_subdirectory(bin)
add_subdirectory(protos)
add_subdirectory(unittests)

add_library(yt-chyt-server)
target_compile_options(yt-chyt-server PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(yt-chyt-server PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/base
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/double-conversion
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Util/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/re2
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)
target_link_libraries(yt-chyt-server PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-query-engine
  yt-chyt-client
  chyt-client-protos
  chyt-server-protos
  ytserver
  server-lib-chunk_pools
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-library-clickhouse_discovery
  yt-library-clickhouse_functions
  contrib-clickhouse-src
  clickhouse-base-base
  contrib-deprecated-clickhouse_data_streams_compat
)

add_global_library_for(yt-chyt-server.global yt-chyt-server)
target_compile_options(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/base
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/double-conversion

  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include

  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/re2
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)
target_link_libraries(yt-chyt-server.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-query-engine
  yt-chyt-client
  chyt-client-protos
  chyt-server-protos
  ytserver
  server-lib-chunk_pools
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-library-clickhouse_discovery
  yt-library-clickhouse_functions
  contrib-clickhouse-src
  clickhouse-base-base
  contrib-deprecated-clickhouse_data_streams_compat
)
target_sources(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/chyt/server/functions_version.cpp
)
